channel.title: midnight solarium
channel.description: a website dedicated to all organisms, formations, and concepts that grow in the night

item.title: is this how you make an RSS feed?
item.description: finally slapped together an RSS feed (which you are reading right now! assuming i did it right!), retroactively added lazyloading to some image-heavy pages, added new slippers to craft catalog, added more notes to notebook, added one easter egg (good luck!)
